fields.text: Welcome to Hotwire, your San Francisco-based travel partner for low-rate flights, hotels, cars, and vacation packages.
To make a new reservation, press [INDEX].
To manage an existing booking or speak with customer care, press [INDEX].
Please hold the line while we connect you to our flight reservations team.
For hotels, cars, and vacation package bookings, press [INDEX].
One moment please while we transfer you to our hotel, car, and vacation package specialists.
To modify or cancel your existing reservation, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to a reservations specialist for modifications and cancellations.
For billing inquiries or general customer support, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we transfer you to our customer support team for billing and general assistance.
